keyMoments.title: Agents Sabotage Peace Attempt
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works agents disguised as royal soldiers shoot Koza from behind as he attempts to broker peace, sabotaging the white flag surrender and ensuring the war continues.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Baroque Works' deep infiltration of Alabasta's military and Crocodile's contingency planning to ensure his scheme succeeds regardless of circumstances.

goals.description: Crocodile's plan to use the civil war to destroy Alabasta's military forces with a bomb, then take over the kingdom and locate the ancient weapon Pluton.

reveals.information: Baroque Works agents have infiltrated the royal army
The organization has contingency plans to sabotage any peace attempts
